34 #ifndef ROSSERIAL_SERVER_ASYNC_READ_BUFFER_H
35 #define ROSSERIAL_SERVER_ASYNC_READ_BUFFER_H
36 
37 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
38 #include <boost/asio.hpp>
39 #include <boost/function.hpp>
40 
41 #include <ros/ros.h>
42 
43 namespace rosserial_server
44 {
45 
46 template<typename AsyncReadStream>
47 class AsyncReadBuffer
48 {
49 public:
50  AsyncReadBuffer(AsyncReadStream& s, size_t capacity,
51  boost::function<void(const boost::system::error_code&)> error_callback)
52  : stream_(s), error_callback_(error_callback) {
53  mem_.resize(capacity);
54  ROS_ASSERT_MSG(error_callback_, "Bad error callback passed to read buffer.");
55  }
56 
57  void read(size_t read_count, boost::function<void(ros::serialization::IStream&)> callback) {
58  if (read_count > mem_.size()) {
59  // Insufficient room in the buffer for the requested bytes,
60  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("async_read", "Requested to read " << read_count << " bytes, but buffer capacity is only " << mem_.size() << ".");
61  error_callback_(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::no_buffer_space));
62  return;
63  }
64 
65  boost::asio::async_read(stream_,
66  boost::asio::buffer(&mem_[0], read_count),
67  boost::asio::transfer_at_least(read_count),
68  boost::bind(&AsyncReadBuffer::read_cb, this,
69  boost::asio::placeholders::error,
70  boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred,
71  callback));
72  }
73 
74 private:
75  void read_cb(const boost::system::error_code& error, size_t bytes_transferred,
76  boost::function<void(ros::serialization::IStream&)> callback) {
77  if (error)
78  {
79  if (error == boost::asio::error::operation_aborted)
80  {
81  // Special case for operation_aborted. The abort callback comes when the owning Session
82  // is in the middle of teardown, which means the callback is no longer valid and calling
83  // it would be a segfault.
84  }
85  else
86  {
87  error_callback_(error);
88  }
89  } else {
90  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED("async_read", "Transferred " << bytes_transferred << " byte(s).");
91 
92  ros::serialization::IStream stream(&mem_[0], bytes_transferred);
93  ROS_ASSERT_MSG(callback, "Bad read callback function.");
94  callback(stream);
95  }
96  }
97 
98  AsyncReadStream& stream_;
99  std::vector<uint8_t> mem_;
100  boost::function<void(const boost::system::error_code&)> error_callback_;
101 };
102 
103 } // namespace
104 
105 #endif // ROSSERIAL_SERVER_ASYNC_READ_BUFFER_H
